subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: While Commissioner Bud Selig remained noncommittal about whether he would attend the games when Barry Bonds is on the verge of breaking Hank Aaron’s record, there are indications that he will.
snippet: While Commissioner Bud Selig remained noncommittal about whether he would attend the games when Barry Bonds is on the verge of breaking Hank Aaron’s record, there are indications that he will.
